ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: In the Permanent Magnet Moving Coil (PMMC) instruments, damping is provided by
ENGLISH.OPT1: The coil spring attached to the moving coil.
ENGLISH.OPT2: The aluminium frame to the moving coil.
ENGLISH.OPT3: Damping vane in the air tight chamber.

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT: A rectifier type instrument with full wave rectification along with PMMC movement of 50 μA and series resistance 1000 Ω is employed for voltage measurement of range (0 - 10 V) ac sinusoidal. If the diodes used in rectifier circuit have identical forward resistance of 100 Ω, then series multiplier resistance needed for measurement will be

A 10 A electro dynamic ammeter is controlled by the spring having constant 0.1 × 10–6 N-m/degree. The full scale deflection is 110°. The value of inductance of the instrument when measuring a current of 10 A (when mutual inductance at 0° deflection is 2 μH and change in mutual inductance is linear with deflection) will be
In the Wheatstone bridge in figure, each resistance is increased by 0.05%. The value of V0 will be

A moving iron ammeter produces a full scale torque of 360 μN-m with a deflection of 150° at a current ‘X’ ampere. The rate of change of self inductance (μH/radian) of the instrument at full scale is 7.2 μH/radian. The value of constant ‘X’ is ________ A.

A moving coil instrument has resistance of 20 Ω and gives full scale deflection when the current is 10 mA. The value of series resistance needed so that it can be used as a voltmeter for measuring potential difference upto 400 V will be _______ kΩ. (Answer upto 2 decimal places)

A simple slide wire potentiometer is used for measurement of current in the circuit. The voltage drop across a standard resistor of 0.5 Ω is balanced at 100 cm. The magnitude of current of the standard cell of 2.5 V is balanced at 50 cm is ____________ A.

The variable ‘A’ is related to three other variables B, C and D as A = The variables B, C and D are measured with meters of accuracy ± 0.4% of reading, ±1.2% of full scale value and ±1.5% of reading respectively. If actual readings are respectively 90, 20 and 60 with 100 being full scale value for B, C and D. The maximum limiting error in reading of A will be ± ________ % of reading. (Answer upto 1 decimal place)

For a certain dynamometer ammeter the mutual inductance M varies with deflection θ (expressed in degrees) as

The deflecting torque produced by a direct current of 50 mA corresponding to a deflection of 60° is
A voltage of 200 V produces a deflection of 90° in a PMMC spring controlled Instrument. If the same instrument is provided with gravity control, then the deflection would be
ENGLISH.OPT4: cannot be known from the data given

ENGLISH.QUESTION_TEXT:
Two resistors R1 and R2 are connected in series. The value of resistances are

If the error in R1 and R2 has to be considered as standard deviation then the standard deviation in series equivalent resistance is
Two meters are connected in series with current, flowing through the combination as shown below. The ratio of reading of the two meters (M1 : M2) will be

A half wave rectifier type AC voltmeter consists of a series resistance ‘RS’ ideal diode ‘D’ and PMMC instrument as shown in figure. The internal resistance of instrument is 100 Ω and full scale deflection is produced by a DC current of 10 mA. The value of RS required to obtain full scale deflection with an AC voltage of 100 V (rms), applied to the input terminal is __________ Ω
In a parallel combination of two milli-ammeters with full scale deflection 10 mA and 100 mA shows reading of 4 mA and 24 mA respectively. The ratio of their internal resistance will be

A strain gauge is attached in one arm of bridge as shown below represented by Rs and has nominal resistance of 200 Ω without any load. Other bridge resistance are R2 = R3 = R4 = 200 Ω. The maximum permissible current through the strain gauge is 10 mA. During certain measurement when bridge is excited by maximum permissible voltage, the reading in voltmeter, V0 was measured 32 mV. The new value of resistance of strain gauge is _______ Ω. (Answer upto 2 decimal places)

A moving coil ammeter has a uniform scale with 50 division and gives a full scale reading of 10 A. The instrument can read up to (1/5)th of a scale division with a fair degree of certainity. The resolution of the instrument (in mA) is__________.

A moving iron ammeter having range (0 - 10 A) has internal resistance of 80 mΩ and inductance of 0.2 mH. A shunt coil is connected to extend its range to 0 - 100 A for all operating frequencies. Which of the below given conclusions are correct?
ENGLISH.OPT1: The value of time constant of the shunt coil is 0.25 msec.
ENGLISH.OPT2: The resistance of the shunt coil is 80 mΩ.
ENGLISH.OPT3: The value of time constant of the shunt coil is 2.5 msec.
ENGLISH.OPT4: The multiplying factor of the shunt added will be 10.
